entries.title: Don't Get Around Much Anymore - vCho

entries.content: Solitude belongs to a Medley, performed by orchestra and choir only. Between Don't Get Around Much Anymore and Sophisticated Lady are performed I Got It Bad and It Don't Mean A Thing without Ellington.
